DOC.brief_title: Investigation Newly Developed 1-piece Convex Baseplates Subjects With Ileostomy
DOC.criteria: Subjects must comply follow criterion order participate investigation : 1 . Are least 18 year age full legal capacity 2 . Have ileostomy least 3 month 3 . Have use convex ostomy appliance last month 4 . Have give write informed consent 5 . Have ileostomy diameter 33 mm less 6 . Have experience leakage ( seep ) baseplate least two time last two week Subjects comply follow criterion must exclude participation clinical investigation : 1 . Have loop ostomy ( also call doublebarrel ostomy two outlet ) 2 . Are pregnant breastfeed 3 . Currently receive , receive within last 2 month , chemotherapy radiation therapy . 4 .
